benchmark_details.name: DevGPT: Studying Developer-ChatGPT Conversations
benchmark_details.overview: This paper introduces DevGPT, a dataset curated to explore how software developers interact with ChatGPT, a prominent large language model (LLM). The dataset encompasses 29,778 prompts and responses from ChatGPT, including 19,106 code snippets, and is linked to corresponding software development artifacts such as source code, commits, issues, pull requests, discussions, and Hacker News threads.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To enable the analysis of the context and implications of developer interactions with ChatGPT.

data.source: Shared ChatGPT conversations collected from GitHub and Hacker News.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are derived from the examination of the dataset's interactions.
methodology.interpretation: Effective interactions can be interpreted through the success of issue resolution tied to queries posed.
